name: Shenzhen Innovation and Experience Camp
issuer: Overseas Chinese Affairs Office of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Municipal
desc: Engaged in a hands-on summer camp focusing on innovation, entrepreneurship, and cultural exchange. Collaborated with peers to develop creative solutions to real-world problems and participated in workshops led by industry experts, enhancing teamwork and project management skills.
